meanings.definition: A device for controlling the flow of liquid from a pipe
meanings.sent1: The plumber fixed the leak by adjusting the taps on the pipe.
meanings.sent2: The sound of water flowing through the taps was soothing.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play with the taps in the kitchen sink.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced on the taps, regulating the water flow like a maestro.
meanings.sent5: The shiny brass taps gleamed under the bathroom lights.

meanings.definition: A light, rhythmic sound made by striking a surface
meanings.sent1: The taps of rain on the window created a calming melody.
meanings.sent2: The dancer's taps echoed through the studio as she practiced her routine.
meanings.sent3: The taps of the typewriter filled the room with a nostalgic sound.
meanings.sent4: His heart skipped a beat at the taps on the door, hoping it was her.
meanings.sent5: The taps of the drum signaled the start of the performance.

meanings.sent1: She taps her pencil on the desk when she's thinking.
meanings.sent2: He taps his foot nervously during the exam.
meanings.sent3: The butterfly gently taps its wings against the flower petals.
meanings.sent4: The wind taps the window pane, trying to get her attention.
meanings.sent5: He taps his friend on the shoulder to get his attention.

meanings.definition: To connect a wire or device to a power source
meanings.sent1: He taps the cord into the socket to charge his phone.
meanings.sent2: She taps the plug firmly into the outlet to power the lamp.
meanings.sent3: The robot taps into the main power grid for energy.
meanings.sent4: The electric car taps into renewable energy sources for charging.
meanings.sent5: He taps the cable into the computer to transfer data.

meanings.definition: To select or choose something, especially on a touchscreen device
meanings.sent1: She taps the screen to open the app on her phone.
meanings.sent2: He taps the icon to confirm his selection on the tablet.
meanings.sent3: The child taps randomly on the screen, trying to play a game.
meanings.sent4: She taps the image to zoom in for a closer look.
meanings.sent5: He taps the button to send the message on the chat app.
